import classes from'./CartButton.module.css';import{useDispatch,useSelector}from'react-redux';import{cartIsShownActions}from'../../store/store';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var CartButton=function CartButton(props){var Amount=0;var dispatchCart=useDispatch();var cartIsShownStatus=useSelector(function(state){return state.showCart.cartIsShown;});var cartItems=useSelector(function(state){return state.items.items;});//i could use state in Redux that includes amount of items but in this example i used forEach to show one more way to calculate items amount i cart  
cartItems.forEach(function(item){Amount=Amount+item.quantity;});var toggleCartHandler=function toggleCartHandler(){dispatchCart(cartIsShownActions.showCart());console.log(cartIsShownStatus);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{className:classes.button,onClick:toggleCartHandler,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"My Cart"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:classes.badge,children:Amount})]});};export default CartButton;
